attributes.action: Teach wheel chair rugby in schools
attributes.background: In pe lessons wheel chair rugby is to be taught to be more inclusive

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what sports to teach in school are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you are concerned about the range of spots taught in a particular school you could raise this with that school, or a local councillor.

You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
